title: Contracts For Symbol (request)
description: For a given symbol, get the list of currently available contracts, and the latest barrier and duration limits for each contract.

contracts_for.description: The short symbol name (obtained from `active_symbols` call).

currency.description: [Optional] Currency of the contract's stake and payout (obtained from `payout_currencies` call).

landing_company_short.description: [Optional] Indicates which landing company to get a list of contracts for. If you are logged in, your account's landing company will override this field. Note that when landing_company_short is set to 'virtual', landing_company will take precendce until the deprecated field is removed from the api.

product_type.description: [Optional] If you specify this field, only contracts tradable through that contract type will be returned.

loginid.description: [Optional] The login id of the user. If left unspecified, it defaults to the initial authorized token's login id.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field. Maximum size is 3500 bytes.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
